snippet: A trade group for the pornography industry called for a moratorium on production after the third performer in less than a month tested positive for H.I.V.
abstract: Free Speech Coalition, trade group for the multibillion-dollar pornography industry, calls for production to be suspended after a third performer in less than a month tests positive for HIV.
lead_paragraph: A trade group for the pornography industry called for a moratorium on production after the third performer in less than a month tested positive for H.I.V.

headline.main: Sex Films Halted After a String of Positive H.I.V. Tests
headline.print_headline: Sex Films Halted After a String of Positive H.I.V. Tests
